body.name: VECELO 14" Metal Platform Bed Frame/Mattress Foundation/No Box Spring Needed/Steel Slat Support (Full Size)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 🎄 This full bed frame is designed for sleepers up to 600 pounds.Inner diameter size (recommended mattress size)：75"L x 54"W
🎄【Sturdy and durable】 WIth tight welding and steel slat,this bed frame,offers stable and level support,preventing the matress from sagging,enhance the matress's life.
🎄【Enough Space】 Welcome to choose the 14-inch style bed ,14.2 inches high with 12.6 inches of clearance under the frame for valuable under bed storage space.

🎄【Noise Free】Still worry about the bed rattling when you sleep? We have upgraded the structure of this bed frame, reinforcing a steel frame at each end, and after you tighten the screws, the whole bed frame is very stable, giving you a restful sleep.
🎄【VECELO Support】 We will pack the item in its best condition and add buffers in the box to protect it from shipping damages.You can contact with us any time.
body.description: What are our advantages?NO Boxing Spring NeededCost Effective12.6 in under bed clearanceEnhanced Metal LegsExcellent Customer-ServiceSpecifications:Bed Frame Color: BlackRecommended Mattress Size: 75 x 39 in (Twin ) 75 x 54 in (Full ), 80 x 60 in (Queen ),80 x 76 in (King )Max Load: 350 lb(Twin), 600 lb(Full), 660 lb(Queen) ,700 lb(King)Package Includes: 1 x Bed Frame1 x Instruction1 x Assembly KitTips:Do not tighten screws until fully assembled.Make sure the legs remain in contact with the ground.Mattress is not includedCheck all screws or bolts are tightened and inspect regularly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VECELO -Creating Beauty and Value for Your Life VECELO Modern Simplicity Metal Bed Frame

PRODUCT INFORMATION · Size: 76.5x55.5x14.2" (L x W x H) · Material: Metal Steel · Color: Black Tips · Do not tighten screws until fully assembled. · Makin sure all screws and bolts. · Keep the legs remain in contact with ground.

VECELO Full Size Bed Frame . Sturdy and durable steel slats not only give stability and level support but also help prevent mattress from sagging and enhance mattress life,No box spring needed. .With anti-scratch foot cover, which can reduce friction to protect the floor from scratching. .High quality metal frame，strong square steel tubing construction. .Metal tube with powder coating,which avoiding rusty in a long period. .Multiple reinforced structure for stability.

Steel Innovation VECELO bed frame using Upgraded Extra-strong square tube slats provide a stable and secure support environment, the pressure of the whole frame bears up to 600lbs, fully meet the daily use of family. Sweet Sleep Partner Multiple reinforced structure for stability, allow you turn over freely with no swelling or noise Enhanced comfort your life with non-squeaky relaxed platform bed. 12.6" Under Bed Clearance 12.6” under bed clearance for ample storage space! Store odd bits & ends under the bed to perfect that clean look of your bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bedframe, instructions were a bit confusing
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is amazing. It holds my bed, super sturdy, and it makes absolutely no noise. The only thing I struggled with was with the instructions. Some of the screws were close together, so in the instructions, they have a lot of arrows pointing to one specific location with different screws and it would confuse me. Other than that, the assembly was pretty easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame looks clean and pleasing to the eye however was a pain to put together with the tools provided highly recommend using your own as it’ll take three times as long to assemble otherwise , lastly for my friends wondering it holds immaculately for those late night activities in case you were on the fence 10/10 would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice frame but loud and squeakey
reviews.reviewText: Took about an hour and 30 mins to build with just 2 people did not put the entire middle long metal bar because it was way too confusing. It was about around the last step for the bed. Does not entirely fit the whole bed and my bed is full size. The middle bar isn't as sturdy which makes the bed squeak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, love the look of it and it’s very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were a little difficult, but the biggest issue is the frame is too big. I bought the full size for my full size bed and it’s maybe an inch too big and easy to run your shin into. And it doesn’t work with a headboard.It is sturdy though and no box spring necessary is a bonus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed is actually really sturdy and worth the money spent. My teenager is rough on the last few beds she's had so we decided to go with metal and so far so good with this one and she really likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stay away from purchasing this bed frame - AWFUL!
reviews.reviewText: This Frame is Not sturdy or worth your Time, Effort and Money.. The screws they give you to assemble do not FIT! I purchased it for my college student's fraternity bedroom and we just attempted to put this together. The washers do not match up with the screws for tightness. The quality of this frame is so poor. Unfortunately, I discard the box so I can NOT return it.. So the next best thing was... I Threw the Frame in the Dumpster and purchased another frame elsewhere. Again, Please Do Not Waste your MONEY! Look elsewhere. I have never written a REVIEW on Amazon before, For either Good or Bad purposes... However, I feel so strongly about this quality.. I needed too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy very comfortable easy to assemble

No fue tan fácil de armar como la que había comprado antes de otra marca y los soportes no tienen esta tira de adhesivo o Velcro como otros para evitar que el colchón se mueva tanto, pero está bien para su precio, me sacó del apuro ya que la otra marca no tenían disponible este tamaño para entrega tan rápida

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, solid and value for money , had to return ad it was a double, I thought it was a small double so a bit big for the mattress. However upon return Evri failed to collect the item on two occasions. Amazon was great at rectifying the problem and arranged a pick up with DPD.

reviews.reviewTitle: A lot of storage and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were clear and pretty easy to follow. I assembled this with ease by myself; however, it would be a lot quicker and easier if there were two people.One thing I found unusual was that not all the legs touch the ground when the entire is assembled. However, when you put your mattress on it or any weight on it, it presses those legs to the ground. IIt was particular the middle leg that is slightly lifted from the ground. Despite this flaw, it is a very study frame. Just make sure to tighten all the screws and bolts!To give you an idea of how much storage there is under this frame, I was able to fit 1 medium suitcase and 8 storage bags packed with clothes yet still have room to spare for more storage.Overall, this is a great bedframe that's affordable and offers a ton of storage!

I really like this product. I found it sturdy and liked the space it created. It does say you can use it with a boxspring, however a boxspring is not needed. I put my boxspring and mattress on it and it was awful. I just didn't want to get rid of my boxspring (new-ish condition) and didn't have a convenient place to store it. In the end, I would say you can't use it with a boxspring.
